span.p:
Term & Conditions
1) Payment will be made through cross cheque in favor of "Meximp Technologies".
2) We are the exclusive distributor of Agilent TechnologiesPathology, Flow Cytometry & Specific Proteins.

tr.style: background-color: #dddddd;border-top:1px solid black !important;border-bottom:1px solid black !important;border-left:1px solid black !important;border-right:1px solid black !important;

td.strong: Withholding Tax Not To Be Deducted

td.p: WH Tax U/S 148 of the I. Tax. Ord. 2001 has bee paid at import stage, and supplied without any value addition. Therefore, no with-holding tax be deducted U/S 153 (1) and as per CBR S.R.O.# 97(1) 2002, dated 12-02-2002.
Payment to be made through crossed cheque in favour of "Meximp Technologies". Cash payment will not be accepted.
